pages.text: The Grinder is used to recycle guns, armors and some other items. It has an input slot, 9 output slots and an $(l:machine_mechanics#upgrade)upgrade slot$(/l).

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: The left input slot is for input, the right slots are for output. $(br)Available Recipes may differ on mod setup and should be viewed with Just Enough Items (JEI).
